src:
The edit... Colourful winter jumpers – in pictures
03 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Jo Jones

Brighten up these short, dark days with vibrant knitwear in bold patterns




Argyle, £195, Pringle Reissued at pringlescotland.com This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase. All our journalism is independent and is in no way influenced by any advertiser or commercial initiative. By clicking on an affiliate link, you accept that third-party cookies will be set. More information.

Mohair and wool, £25.99, zara.com



Puff sleeve, £370, ganni.com



Wave pattern, £95, stories.com



Star print, £36.96, gap.co.uk



Brown geometric, £189, whistles.com



Leopard print, £19.99, hm.com



Mohair blend, £510, Isabel Marant at net-a-porter.com



Odell ribbed, £100, kitristudio.com



Brown cable knit, £35, marksandspencer.com



Red leopard and zebra print, £210, essentiel-antwerp.com
